segments.text: Mum , pass me some more please !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tina , you should have more nutritious food . Don't eat these crisps any more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the ads say they're most nutritious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever heard the ads say anything bad about their products ?
segments.speaker: S2
